prefercite.head: Preferred Citation

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: This collection was transferred on April 22, 1994.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of an article "Early Albemarle A Brief Historical Sketch" by John Cook Wyllie (1908-1968) published in Virginia and The Virginia County"in March 1949, beginning on page nine, and related papers, including notes, bibliography, and correspondence about its publication.
